Mailing Address: PO Box 20139RPO Town Center MallKelowna, BC     V1Y 9H2
Service Details: - Offers a fellowship of individuals who, through shared experience, strength and hope, are recovering from compulsive overeating- Uses the 12 Step Program and 12 Traditions- Provides a fellowship of experience, strength and hope where members respect one another’s anonymity- Addresses physical, emotional and spiritual well-being- Practices unity with diversity, and welcomes everyone who wants to stop eating compulsively
Meetings: All meetings are at the Kalano Club, 2108 Vasile Rd, Kelowna:- Mon: 6:00pm * OA Steps and/or Traditions Study * this group is open- Sat: 10:00am * this is a closed group * Contact Theresa for info at 250.469.3689
